targets.query:
CarTelemetry24
| union CarStatus24, Lap24, Participant24, Session24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| count

Participant24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project Name

Participant24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc | take 1
| join  kind=rightsemi Teams  on $left.TeamId == $right.Id
| project Name

Participant24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc | take 1
| join  kind=rightsemi Nationalities  on $left.Nationality == $right.Id
| project Name

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project CurrentLapNum

Session24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project TotalLaps

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project GridPosition

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project CarPosition

Participant24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project NumOfActiveCars

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project DriverStatus

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc, SessionTime desc 
| take 1
| project PitStatus

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project LapDistance

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project TotalDistance

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project Penalties

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project CurrentLapTimeInMS

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project LastLapTimeInMS

Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc, SessionTime desc
| take 1
| project ResultStatus

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project SessionTime

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project Weather

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc 
| take 1
| join  kind=rightsemi Tracks on $left.TrackId == $right.Id
| project Name

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc 
| take 1
| project TrackLength

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| top 10 by Timestamp desc
| order by Timestamp asc
| project AirTemp

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| top 10 by Timestamp desc
| order by Timestamp asc
| project TrackTemp

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project SessionTimeLeft

Session24
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project SessionDuration

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project Speed

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project EngineRPM

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex
| top 10 by Timestamp desc
| order by Timestamp asc
| project Gear

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project ABS

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project TractionControl

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| top 10 by Timestamp desc  
| order by Timestamp asc
| project FuelInTank

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project FuelCapacity

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| top 10 by Timestamp desc
| order by Timestamp asc
| project FuelRemainingLaps

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project DRSAllowed

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1 
| project VehicleFIAFlags

CarDamage24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project EngineDamage, GearBoxDamage, FLWingDamage, FRWingDamage, RearWingDamage

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, Gear, Clutch

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp
| project Steering, Timestamp

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, Throttle, Brake

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp
| project Speed, Timestamp

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| project EngineTemp, Timestamp

CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project VisualTyreCompound

CarDamage24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project FLTyreWear, FRTyreWear, RLTyreWear, RRTyreWear

CarDamage24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp desc
| take 1
| project FLTyreDamage, FRTyreDamage, RLTyreDamage, RRTyreDamage

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, FLTyrePressure, FRTyrePressure, RLTyrePressure, RRTyrePressure

CarTelemetry24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, FLTyreSurfaceTemp, FRTyreSurfaceTemp, RLTyreSurfaceTemp, RRTyreSurfaceTemp

CarDamage24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex== VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, FLTyreWear, FRTyreWear, RLTyreWear, RRTyreWear

CarDamage24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and PlayerCarIndex == VehicleIndex 
| order by Timestamp
| project Timestamp, FLTyreDamage, FRTyreDamage, RLTyreDamage, RRTyreDamage

let participant = Participant24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| partition by VehicleIndex (
    top 1 by Timestamp desc
)
| project VehicleIndex, Name;
let tyre = CarStatus24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| partition by VehicleIndex
    (
        top 1 by Timestamp desc
    )
| extend Tyre = case(  
    VisualTyreCompound == 16, "S",  
    VisualTyreCompound == 17, "M",  
    VisualTyreCompound == 18, "H",  
    VisualTyreCompound == 7, "I",  
    VisualTyreCompound == 8, "W",  
    "unknown"  
)
| project Tyre, VehicleIndex;
Lap24
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and CarPosition between (1 .. 20)
| order by Timestamp desc
| partition by CarPosition (top 1 by SessionTime desc)
| join kind=leftouter participant on VehicleIndex
| join kind=leftouter tyre on VehicleIndex
| extend 
    IntvTime = totimespan(DeltaToCarInFrontMinutesPart * 1m + DeltaToCarInFrontMSPart * 1ms),
    LeadTime = totimespan(DeltaToRaceLeaderMinutesPart * 1m + DeltaToRaceLeaderMSPart * 1ms)
| project CarPosition, Name, Tyre, IntvTime, LeadTime
| order by CarPosition asc
